attributes.action: ensure that summer 2008 in the UK is hot and sunny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Summer 2007 was a complete and utter disaster. 'Twas rainy and grey most days, and was completely unsatisfactory. This was probably Tony Blair's fault, so here's to hoping Gordon Brown can sort the weather out.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
